name: Radio Madhuban Community Society

address: Pandav Bhawan, Dadi Prakash Mani Marg

briefDescription: RMCS has  focused approach to achieve its goal of reaching to masses through its service initiatives.  Much churn out has been done to bring about innovation in sustaining  services to the society. Each and every individual at micro level should  experience peace and happiness in their lives, is the ultimate aim of the RMCS. RMCS looks ahead to bring about qualitative  change in the community through innovative  service channells. The following methodology will be adopted to  accomplish  the  aims and objectives.
